title: Cafe Greg - Ayalon Mall
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Middle Eastern, Israeli, Kosher, Non-veg
description: Serves fish, veg options available. In the Ayalon Mall at the HaYam entrance to the mall. Sit inside or out in the mall space. There is a separate vegan menu with breakfast, salads, sandwiches, and hot dishes. Any drink on the menu can be made with soy milk. Plenty of outdoor parking.
